Text: Thanks, please let me know what you think of the quality.

This is great, thanks. Just to let others know, this is the real movie and it's in English. The quality is pretty good for how old the movie is. I give it a 10/10 for quality and the sound is a little quiet but its still good so I give the sound 8/10. Thank you so much for uploading this movie, I watched it a lot when i was a kid and haven't been able to find it on any movie streaming websites.
A6\V5   Movie is not even full screen its in a small shitty box in the center of the screen. I wasted my time downloading. Now i need to find another copy and redownload! Thanks Uploader!
To get around this irritating problem of the small box press C to crop the movie when using VLC Media Player. This is the only copy i can find on the net so thanks to uploader
